rules.goalActivity: Adjust recommendations to the goal (lose/maintain/increase) and activity level.
rules.safeRanges: Give advice within safe ranges and avoid extremes.
rules.vegan: Do not suggest meat, fish, seafood, eggs or dairy products.
rules.vegetarian: Do not suggest meat or fish; dairy and eggs are allowed unless restricted otherwise.
rules.keto: Maintain low carbohydrate intake and higher fat.
rules.paleo: Exclude grains, dairy and processed foods.
rules.noLactose: Do not suggest dairy products containing lactose; offer plant-based alternatives.
rules.diabetes: Prefer low glycemic load, avoid simple sugars.
rules.hypertension: Limit sodium, prefer potassium, vegetables, DASH-like diet.

prefers.vegetarianSources: eggs, dairy, legumes, tofu, whole grain products
prefers.mediterranean: olive oil, fish, vegetables, legumes, whole grains, nuts

tone.detailed: Detailed, with a short bullet list.

focus.analyzingMistakes: First point out mistakes, then corrections.
focus.quickAnswers: Provide a short answer without digressions.
focus.default: Adapt the answer to the question.
